column4: I need to roll back from libgl1-mesa-dri (7.4-0ubuntu3)  to 7.3 . Where can I download the archive and perform this operation?
have you tried using the force option in synaptic?
there's not available option to downgrade
try searching for that package on google and downloading it.
searching for "libgl1-mesa-dri (7.4-0ubuntu3)" in google returns nothing
ok let me look
sorry wrong paste, the package that I need is libgl1-mesa-dri_7.3 386
these are all i found
I cannot find it, I'll ask for help
Is this it? http://launchpadlibrarian.net/24403993/libgl1-mesa-dri_7.3-1ubuntu4_i386.deb\
Is this it? http://launchpadlibrarian.net/24403993/libgl1-mesa-dri_7.3-1ubuntu4_i386.deb
how did you find it?
google :)
but I've searched the very same name?
where do you live?
google might be differant in other locations
I usually use the .com version
I need the corresponding mesa-glx package too, but I cannot find it
it's the libgl1-mesa-glx 7.3
http://launchpadlibrarian.net/24403991/libgl1-mesa-glx_7.3-1ubuntu4_i386.deb
I cannot understand why you're able to find it but thank you very much
the workaround worked, I've solved my problem: thank you very much
